zero_section:

protected theorem zero_section (e : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] {x : B} (hx : x ‚àà e.base_set) :
    e (zero_section E x) = (x, 0) := by

trivialization_at_symmL:

theorem trivialization_at_symmL {b‚ÇÄ b : B} (hb : b ‚àà (trivialization_at F Z.fiber b‚ÇÄ).base_set) :
    (trivialization_at F Z.fiber b‚ÇÄ).symmL R b = Z.coord_change (Z.index_at b‚ÇÄ) (Z.index_at b) b :=

    (trivialization_at F Z.fiber b‚ÇÄ).coord_changeL R (trivialization_at F Z.fiber b‚ÇÅ) b v =
      Z.coord_change (Z.index_at b‚ÇÄ) (Z.index_at b‚ÇÅ) b v :=

    (trivialization_at F Z.fiber b‚ÇÄ).continuous_linear_map_at R b = Z.coord_change (Z.index_at b) (Z.index_at b‚ÇÄ) b :=

@[simp]
theorem total_space_mk_preimage_source (b : B) :
    ¬´expr ‚Åª¬π' ¬ª (totalSpaceMk b) (a.pretrivialization_at b).source = univ :=
  a.to_fiber_prebundle.total_space_mk_preimage_source b
#align total_space_mk_preimage_source total_space_mk_preimage_source
to_vector_bundle:
/-- Make a `vector_bundle` from a `vector_prebundle`.  Concretely this means
that, given a `vector_prebundle` structure for a sigma-type `E` -- which consists of a
number of "pretrivializations" identifying parts of `E` with product spaces `U √ó F` -- one
establishes that for the topology constructed on the sigma-type using
`vector_prebundle.total_space_topology`, these "pretrivializations" are actually
"trivializations" (i.e., homeomorphisms with respect to the constructed topology). -/
theorem to_vector_bundle :
    @vector_bundle R _ F E _ _ _ _ _ _ a.total_space_topology a.fiber_topology a.to_fiber_bundle :=
  { trivialization_linear' := by
      rintro _ ‚ü®e, he, rfl‚ü©
      apply linear_of_mem_pretrivialization_atlas
    continuous_on_coord_change' := by
      rintro _ _ ‚ü®e, he, rfl‚ü© ‚ü®e', he', rfl‚ü©
      refine' (a.continuous_on_coord_change he he').congr _
      intro b hb
      ext v
      rw [a.coord_change_apply he he' hb v, ContinuousLinearEquiv.coe_coe, trivialization.coord_changeL_apply]
      exacts[rfl, hb] }
#align to_vector_bundle to_vector_bundle
symm‚Çó_linear_map_at:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
theorem symm‚Çó_linear_map_at (e : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] {b : B} (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set) (y : E b) :
    e.symm‚Çó R b (e.linear_map_at R b y) = y :=
  e.to_pretrivialization.symm‚Çó_linear_map_at hb y
#align symm‚Çó_linear_map_at symm‚Çó_linear_map_at
symm_coord_changeL:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
theorem symm_coord_changeL (e e' : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] [e'.is_linear R] {b : B}
    (hb : b ‚àà e'.base_set ‚à© e.base_set) : (e.coord_changeL R e' b).symm = e'.coord_changeL R e b :=
  by
  apply ContinuousLinearEquiv.toLinearEquiv_injective
  rw [coe_coord_changeL' e' e hb, (coord_changeL R e e' b).symm_to_linear_equiv, coe_coord_changeL' e e' hb.symm,
    LinearEquiv.trans_symm, LinearEquiv.symm_symm]
#align symm_coord_changeL symm_coord_changeL

    (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set) : ((e.continuous_linear_equiv_at R b hb).symm : F ‚Üí E b) = e.symmL R b :=

symm_apply_eq_mk_continuous_linear_equiv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
theorem symm_apply_eq_mk_continuous_linear_equiv_at_symm (e : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] (b : B)
    (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set) (z : F) :
    e.to_local_homeomorph.symm ‚ü®b, z‚ü© = totalSpaceMk b ((e.continuous_linear_equiv_at R b hb).symm z) :=
  by
  have h : (b, z) ‚àà e.target := by
    rw [e.target_eq]
    exact ‚ü®hb, mem_univ _‚ü©
  apply e.inj_on (e.map_target h)
  ¬∑ simp only [e.source_eq, hb, mem_preimage]
  simp_rw [e.right_inv h, coe_coe, e.apply_eq_prod_continuous_linear_equiv_at R b hb,
    ContinuousLinearEquiv.apply_symm_apply]
#align symm_apply_eq_mk_continuous_linear_equiv_at_symm symm_apply_eq_mk_continuous_linear_equiv_at_symm
symmL_continuous_linear_map_at:

theorem symmL_continuous_linear_map_at (e : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] {b : B} (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set)
    (y : E b) : e.symmL R b (e.continuous_linear_map_at R b y) = y :=

mk_coord_changeL:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
theorem mk_coord_changeL (e e' : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] [e'.is_linear R] {b : B}
    (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set ‚à© e'.base_set) (y : F) : (b, coord_changeL R e e' b y) = e' (totalSpaceMk b (e.symm b y)) :=
  by
  ext
  ¬∑ rw [e.mk_symm hb.1 y, e'.coe_fst', e.proj_symm_apply' hb.1]
    rw [e.proj_symm_apply' hb.1]
    exact hb.2
  ¬∑ exact e.coord_changeL_apply e' hb y
#align mk_coord_changeL mk_coord_changeL
mk_coord_change:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
theorem mk_coord_change (a : vector_prebundle R F E) {e e' : Pretrivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)}
    (he : e ‚àà a.pretrivialization_atlas) (he' : e' ‚àà a.pretrivialization_atlas) {b : B}
    (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set ‚à© e'.base_set) (v : F) : (b, a.coord_change he he' b v) = e' (totalSpaceMk b (e.symm b v)) :=
  by
  ext
  ¬∑ rw [e.mk_symm hb.1 v, e'.coe_fst', e.proj_symm_apply' hb.1]
    rw [e.proj_symm_apply' hb.1]
    exact hb.2
  ¬∑ exact a.coord_change_apply he he' hb v
#align mk_coord_change mk_coord_change

    {b : B} (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set) : IsLinearMap R fun y : E b => (e (totalSpaceMk b y)).2 :=
  trivialization.is_linear.linear b hb
#align linear linear

#align is_open_map_proj is_open_map_proj

in_coordinates_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr ‚ÜíSL[ ] ¬ª -/
/-- rewrite `in_coordinates` in a `vector_bundle_core`. -/
protected theorem vector_bundle_core.in_coordinates_eq {Œπ Œπ'} (Z : vector_bundle_core ùïú‚ÇÅ B F Œπ)
    (Z' : vector_bundle_core ùïú‚ÇÇ B' F' Œπ') {x‚ÇÄ x : B} {y‚ÇÄ y : B'} (œï : ¬´expr ‚ÜíSL[ ] ¬ª F œÉ F')
    (hx : x ‚àà Z.base_set (Z.index_at x‚ÇÄ)) (hy : y ‚àà Z'.base_set (Z'.index_at y‚ÇÄ)) :
    in_coordinates F Z.fiber F' Z'.fiber x‚ÇÄ x y‚ÇÄ y œï =
      (Z'.coord_change (Z'.index_at y) (Z'.index_at y‚ÇÄ) y).comp
        (œï.comp <| Z.coord_change (Z.index_at x‚ÇÄ) (Z.index_at x) x) :=
  by simp_rw [in_coordinates, Z'.trivialization_at_continuous_linear_map_at hy, Z.trivialization_at_symmL hx]
#align vector_bundle_core.in_coordinates_eq vector_bundle_core.in_coordinates_eq
coord_change_linear_comp:
theorem coord_change_linear_comp (i j k : Œπ) :
    ‚àÄ x ‚àà Z.base_set i ‚à© Z.base_set j ‚à© Z.base_set k,
      (Z.coord_change j k x).comp (Z.coord_change i j x) = Z.coord_change i k x :=
  fun x hx => by
  ext v
  exact Z.coord_change_comp i j k x hx v
#align coord_change_linear_comp coord_change_linear_comp
coord_changeL_symm_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr‚áë ¬ª -/
theorem coord_changeL_symm_apply (e e' : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] [e'.is_linear R] {b : B}
    (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set ‚à© e'.base_set) :
    ¬´expr‚áë ¬ª (coord_changeL R e e' b).symm = (e'.linear_equiv_at R b hb.2).symm.trans (e.linear_equiv_at R b hb.1) :=
  congr_arg linear_equiv.inv_fun (dif_pos hb)
#align coord_changeL_symm_apply coord_changeL_symm_apply
coord_changeL_apply':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
/-- A version of `coord_change_apply` that fully unfolds `coord_change`. The right-hand side is
ugly, but has good definitional properties for specifically defined trivializations. -/
theorem coord_changeL_apply' (e e' : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] [e'.is_linear R] {b : B}
    (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set ‚à© e'.base_set) (y : F) :
    coord_changeL R e e' b y = (e' (e.to_local_homeomorph.symm (b, y))).2 := by
  rw [e.coord_changeL_apply e' hb, e.mk_symm hb.1]
#align coord_changeL_apply' coord_changeL_apply'
coord_changeL_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
theorem coord_changeL_apply (e e' : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] [e'.is_linear R] {b : B}
    (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set ‚à© e'.base_set) (y : F) : coord_changeL R e e' b y = (e' (totalSpaceMk b (e.symm b y))).2 :=
  congr_arg (fun f => linear_equiv.to_fun f y) (dif_pos hb)
#align coord_changeL_apply coord_changeL_apply
continuous_total_space_mk:
@[continuity]
theorem continuous_total_space_mk (b : B) :
    @Continuous _ _ (a.fiber_topology b) a.total_space_topology (totalSpaceMk b) :=
  a.to_fiber_prebundle.continuous_total_space_mk b
#align continuous_total_space_mk continuous_total_space_mk
continuous_proj:
/-- The projection on the base of a vector bundle created from core is continuous -/
@[continuity]
theorem continuous_proj : Continuous Z.proj :=
  FiberBundleCore.continuous_proj Z

continuous_on_coord_change:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
theorem continuous_on_coord_change (a : vector_prebundle R F E) {e e' : Pretrivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)}
    (he : e ‚àà a.pretrivialization_atlas) (he' : e' ‚àà a.pretrivialization_atlas) :
    ContinuousOn (a.coord_change he he') (e.base_set ‚à© e'.base_set) :=
  (Classical.choose_spec (a.exists_coord_change e he e' he')).1
#align continuous_on_coord_change continuous_on_coord_change
continuous_linear_map_at_symmL:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
theorem continuous_linear_map_at_symmL (e : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] {b : B} (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set)
    (y : F) : e.continuous_linear_map_at R b (e.symmL R b y) = y :=
  e.linear_map_at_symm‚Çó hb y
#align continuous_linear_map_at_symmL continuous_linear_map_at_symmL
continuous_linear_equiv_at_apply':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
@[simp]
theorem continuous_linear_equiv_at_apply' (e : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] (x : TotalSpace E)
    (hx : x ‚àà e.source) : e.continuous_linear_equiv_at R x.proj (e.mem_source.1 hx) x.2 = (e x).2 :=
  by
  cases x
  rfl
#align continuous_linear_equiv_at_apply' continuous_linear_equiv_at_apply'
comp_continuous_linear_equiv_at_eq_coord:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
theorem comp_continuous_linear_equiv_at_eq_coord_change (e e' : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R]
    [e'.is_linear R] {b : B} (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set ‚à© e'.base_set) :
    (e.continuous_linear_equiv_at R b hb.1).symm.trans (e'.continuous_linear_equiv_at R b hb.2) =
      coord_changeL R e e' b :=
  by
  ext v
  rw [coord_changeL_apply e e' hb]
  rfl
#align comp_continuous_linear_equiv_at_eq_coord_change comp_continuous_linear_equiv_at_eq_coord_change

theorem coe_symm‚Çó (e : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] (b : B) : ¬´expr‚áë ¬ª (e.symm‚Çó R b) = e.symm b :=

coe_linear_map_at_of_mem:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr‚áë ¬ª -/
theorem coe_linear_map_at_of_mem (e : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] {b : B} (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set) :
    ¬´expr‚áë ¬ª (e.linear_map_at R b) = fun y => (e (totalSpaceMk b y)).2 := by simp_rw [coe_linear_map_at, if_pos hb]
#align coe_linear_map_at_of_mem coe_linear_map_at_of_mem
coe_linear_map_at:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr‚áë ¬ª -/
theorem coe_linear_map_at (e : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] (b : B) :
    ¬´expr‚áë ¬ª (e.linear_map_at R b) = fun y => if b ‚àà e.base_set then (e (totalSpaceMk b y)).2 else 0 :=
  e.to_pretrivialization.coe_linear_map_at b
#align coe_linear_map_at coe_linear_map_at
coe_coord_changeL':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
theorem coe_coord_changeL' (e e' : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] [e'.is_linear R] {b : B}
    (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set ‚à© e'.base_set) :
    (coord_changeL R e e' b).to_linear_equiv = (e.linear_equiv_at R b hb.1).symm.trans (e'.linear_equiv_at R b hb.2) :=
  LinearEquiv.coe_injective (coe_coord_changeL _ _ _)
#align coe_coord_changeL' coe_coord_changeL'
coe_coord_changeL:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr‚áë ¬ª -/
theorem coe_coord_changeL (e e' : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] [e'.is_linear R] {b : B}
    (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set ‚à© e'.base_set) :
    ¬´expr‚áë ¬ª (coord_changeL R e e' b) = (e.linear_equiv_at R b hb.1).symm.trans (e'.linear_equiv_at R b hb.2) :=
  congr_arg linear_equiv.to_fun (dif_pos hb)
#align coe_coord_changeL coe_coord_changeL
coe_coord_change:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem coe_coord_change (i j : Œπ) : Z.to_fiber_bundle_core.coord_change i j b = Z.coord_change i j b :=
  rfl
#align coe_coord_change coe_coord_change
coe_continuous_linear_equiv_at_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
-- given explicitly to help `simps`
-- given explicitly to help `simps`
theorem coe_continuous_linear_equiv_at_eq (e : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] {b : B}
    (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set) : (e.continuous_linear_equiv_at R b hb : E b ‚Üí F) = e.continuous_linear_map_at R b :=
  (e.coe_linear_map_at_of_mem hb).symm
#align coe_continuous_linear_equiv_at_eq coe_continuous_linear_equiv_at_eq

apply_symm_apply_eq_coord_changeL:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
theorem apply_symm_apply_eq_coord_changeL (e e' : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] [e'.is_linear R] {b : B}
    (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set ‚à© e'.base_set) (v : F) :
    e' (e.to_local_homeomorph.symm (b, v)) = (b, e.coord_changeL R e' b v) := by
  rw [e.mk_coord_changeL e' hb, e.mk_symm hb.1]
#align apply_symm_apply_eq_coord_changeL apply_symm_apply_eq_coord_changeL
apply_eq_prod_continuous_linear_equiv_at:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprœÄ -/
theorem apply_eq_prod_continuous_linear_equiv_at (e : Trivialization F ((exprœÄ) E)) [e.is_linear R] (b : B)
    (hb : b ‚àà e.base_set) (z : E b) : e ‚ü®b, z‚ü© = (b, e.continuous_linear_equiv_at R b hb z) :=
  by
  ext
  ¬∑ refine' e.coe_fst _
    rw [e.source_eq]
    exact hb
  ¬∑ simp only [coe_coe, continuous_linear_equiv_at_apply]
#align apply_eq_prod_continuous_linear_equiv_at apply_eq_prod_continuous_linear_equiv_at
